label: financial_irregularity_02_ep_012
content:

### Auditor Notes

- Inventory build: $3.2M pre-positioned at regional warehouse

### Notes
- December close: fiscal year-end. Extended close calendar, 6 business days. Revenue recognition checklist completed.
